title: The Ruins
description: Joelle’s a mess. Nightmares about the end of the world keep her up at night, and lack of sleep has her losing job after job.The only consistency to these dreams is the man she calls “The Watcher.” After another night of frustration, The Watcher arrives at her door, in the flesh. Luc, a demon Mare, is the source of all her problems.Could he also be her salvation?
author: Torri Heat
